title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON, TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH-TREATMENT AND REHABILITATION CENTER BICUTAN (DOH-TRC BICUTAN), A FREE STANDING RESIDENTIAL FACILITY UNDER THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH WITH ADDRESS AT 5â„¢ ROAD, CAMP BAGONG DIWA, UPPER BICUTAN, TAGUIG CITY AS PARTNER INSTITUTION OF FACILITY WHERE THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) CAN REFER CLIENTS WHO MAY NEED OR REQUIRE A FACILITY-BASED INTERVENTION PROGRAMS TO FACILITATE THEIR RECOVERY FROM ILLEGAL SUBSTANCE ABUSE UNDER THE LINGAP BAYAN PROGRAM. Councilor
